meanings.definition: A meeting or gathering at a prearranged time and place.
meanings.sent1: The family's rendezvouses at the park were always filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent2: Let's plan a rendezvouses at the library to discuss our project.
meanings.sent3: The surprise birthday party turned into a rendezvouses of friends and family.
meanings.sent4: The city square became a bustling rendezvouses of people during the festival.
meanings.sent5: The annual company picnic was a memorable rendezvouses for all employees.

meanings.definition: To meet or come together at a specific time and place.
meanings.sent1: We will rendezvouses at the cafe for our study group.
meanings.sent2: The team will rendezvouses at the stadium before the game.
meanings.sent3: The cats always seem to rendezvouses in the backyard at night.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky seem to rendezvouses in perfect alignment.
meanings.sent5: The birds will rendezvouses at the feeder every morning.
